rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a reception desk and seating area. Designed with Vastu principles in mind, ensuring the entrance faces north to welcome positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An open-plan living room connecting seamlessly to the dining area; large windows are strategically placed for natural light and ventilation. The layout follows Brutalist principles with raw concrete textures, yet incorporates ample daylight.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, offering a communal space for meals; designed with high ceilings and integrated natural lighting.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: Efficient kitchen design featuring exposed concrete elements and open shelving. Ventilation is enhanced by large windows and skylights, complying with local building norms.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Storage for appliances and cleaning supplies, located near the kitchen for efficient workflow.

openings.description: A wide door facilitating smooth transition between spaces.
Large windows ensuring maximum natural light and ventilation, designed with safety glass per local regulations.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: A luxurious bedroom suite featuring an en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet. Designed to capture natural light with south-facing windows while adhering to Vastu recommendations for the master's direction.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A spacious bedroom designed for privacy and comfort, equipped with large windows ensuring ample daylight.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Another comfortable bedroom offering a balanced mix of light and shadow through strategically placed openings. Vastu principles guide its orientation.

rooms.name: Balcony / Terrace
rooms.description: An outdoor space providing access to the outdoors, designed with durable materials in line with Brutalist aesthetics while allowing cross-ventilation and natural light.

openings.description: Large windows for optimal light; positioned according to Vastu principles to enhance energy flow.
Access door connecting the bedroom to the terrace, ensuring privacy and ease of access.

rooms.name: Library / Study Room
rooms.description: A dedicated library and study area with ample shelving, comfortable seating, and large windows for natural light. The design emphasizes both aesthetics and functionality.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: An additional bedroom ensuring a balanced layout across levels; designed with an emphasis on Vastu principles and natural light.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A modest yet comfortable guest room, complete with necessary amenities. Designed to maximize space efficiency while incorporating natural ventilation elements.

openings.description: Large windows integrated into the design for ample daylight and enhanced ventilation, in keeping with local building norms.
Internal door facilitating easy access between spaces.

vastu_notes: The entrance should ideally face the east or north for positive energy flow.
Master bedrooms are best located on the east or north sides.
Living areas and kitchens benefit from natural light, so ensure windows and openings are maximized.
brutalist_elements: Raw textures in both interior and exterior walls
